Server - Class in server.unipr.it
The class Server defines a server that waits for a message and then sends an answer.

server.unipr.it - package server.unipr.it
Provides classes defining the components for managing Staff member and member Request to the Server and send response to them .
The execution is started by main method contained in the Server.java class.
